markdownRemark.html:
This is my first post on my new fake blog! How exciting!

Software developer, Frontend & Mobile creator, entrepreneur, father and husband

I help to build software products and services from the ground up, particularly Android and iOS native or React Native apps and frontend apps in React.

  • building the team
  • building processes, establishing CI/CD
  • apps deployment
